programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le maire en chocolat / Wendini la magicienne) S8 (2/26)
programme.desc: «Le maire en chocolat / Wendini la magicienne»Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin. // When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos»Sir Steel gets Professor Scratch to create an anti-gravity ray, which goes wrong in the hands of Ricardo! // Muffin's super bouncy ball threatens to wreck the annual Winter Festival! Kai learns to sacrifice something he loves for the greater good!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Raining Teddies) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Raining Teddies»Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Lucky Day / Paddington the Pizza Chef) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Lucky Day / Paddington the Pizza Chef»Paddington Jonathan & Judy are worried they've used up all of Lucky the dog's luck - how will they tell Sofia? // Baaz's niece Simi is visiting & he wants to create the perfect pizza to surprise her with but it's not easy with hungry animals around!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News) S2 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News»The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Treehouse) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Treehouse»Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le patin à glace) S2 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le patin à glace»When Peppa's friends come to play in her tree house, it's super fun, but when the boys come, things go wrong. Peppa unceremoniously puts them out. Grandpa knows what to do and builds a castle hut for the boys, but whether it makes it more fun?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Chez le dentiste) S2 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Chez le dentiste»Peppa has been to the dentist before, but for George it is the first time. And that's scary.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Mission ninja à la montagne) S6 (n°615)
programme.desc: «Mission ninja à la montagne»Ninjas Zooli and Oona are excited for their first mission: escorting snow monkey Moshi up Mt. Danger to join his troop! But it won't be easy: a storm looms, and mischievous Moshi is causing trouble! Will they complete their mission in time?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Cache-cache avec Blue) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Cache-cache avec Blue»Josh, Blue, and all our friends are playing Hide and Seek, and Blue knows the BEST hiding spot! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the best place to hide, we search for our hiding friends and play Snail and Seek with Magenta and Blue.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La chasse au trésor de Blue) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «La chasse au trésor de Blue»Cap'n McStripes (that's ''pirate'' for Josh) and Blue are playing pirates, but where is the treasure?! We play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle) S9 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle»When Humdinger disguises himself as a "Merdinger" to steal the purple pearl, the PAW Patrol must return it to Puplantis. // After Moby swipes the Whale Patroller and all the Pups' vehicles, the pups climb aboard sea creatures to chase it down.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race) S9 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race»The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle) S9 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Un train fou dans le désert / Le parcours d'escalarbre) S8 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Un train fou dans le désert / Le parcours d'escalarbre»When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. // Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le petit crabe perdu) S2 (6/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le petit crabe perdu»The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Madame Patte géante) S1 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Madame Patte géante»George finds a spider in the bathroom sink. Peppa is very scared until she realizes he doesn't want to harm her.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bateau de papi) S1 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le bateau de papi»Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Supermarché) S1 (49/52)
programme.desc: «Le Supermarché»Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Blue Butterfly) S1 (n°73)
programme.desc: «The Blue Butterfly»Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. The friends finally discover the best way to capture their enchanting photo.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Atchoum !) S1 (74/78)
programme.desc: «Atchoum !»Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco) S2 (n°17)
programme.desc: «La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco»Who has put a new fountain in Crystal Lake which is against Park Rules? And it's upsetting Fish Hook! // Sir Steel thinks the deer have stolen Steel Tower's lights, so decides to take theirs with his new Light Sucker!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon) S8 (13/24)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon»Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand) S9 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand»Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés»Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Capitaine Métal / Grosse chaleur) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Métal / Grosse chaleur»Whilst some of the Deer Squad down with flu, Sir Steel tries to become a superhero with disastrous results. // Sir Steel "borrows" water from Crystal Lake for his Water Park in the city, but things soon go wrong!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe»Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure»Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon»Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade, but instead of cutting lemons, they cut corners and learn if something's worth doing, it's worth doing right.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Popcorn) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Popcorn»Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Quiet Game) S1 (n°76)
programme.desc: «The Quiet Game»After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (We Love Nature) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «We Love Nature»Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! A thunder makes things worse. Luckily, Anna's living room makes a great camp site!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Friendship Journal) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Friendship Journal»Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal.".

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William vs. Wild) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «William vs. Wild»After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle) S9 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle»When Humdinger disguises himself as a "Merdinger" to steal the purple pearl, the PAW Patrol must return it to Puplantis. // After Moby swipes the Whale Patroller and all the Pups' vehicles, the pups climb aboard sea creatures to chase it down.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race) S9 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race»The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (L'équipe des Mécaniciens) S5 (12/20)
programme.desc: «L'équipe des Mécaniciens»Blaze stops into Gabby's Garage for a quick repair - just as she gets an alert! Three far-flung trucks need her mechanical know-how! So, Blaze and AJ volunteer to help her take her garage on the go!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle) S9 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le circuit du ciel) S2 (19/20)
programme.desc: «Le circuit du ciel»"As Blaze, AJ, and Gabby fly through the air with their friend Swoops, they see that a baby bird is about to be pulled into a storm! Swoops saves the baby bird from danger, but during his mission he loses his helicopter rotor, which flies off into the sky. Now Blaze and AJ must find the missing rotor, adventuring up onto the Sky Track, an amazing course that weaves through the clouds.".

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La reine cot-cot / La montgolfière du désert) S7 (19/26)
programme.desc: «La reine cot-cot / La montgolfière du désert»Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to the mysterious Cluck Cluck Island-a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty! // Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder, Travis and Cap'n Turbot wind up all the way out into the desert.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le maire en chocolat / Wendini la magicienne) S8 (2/26)
programme.desc: «Le maire en chocolat / Wendini la magicienne»Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin. // When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.desc: «Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos»Sir Steel gets Professor Scratch to create an anti-gravity ray, which goes wrong in the hands of Ricardo! // Muffin's super bouncy ball threatens to wreck the annual Winter Festival! Kai learns to sacrifice something he loves for the greater good!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Raining Teddies) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Raining Teddies»Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Lucky Day / Paddington the Pizza Chef) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Lucky Day / Paddington the Pizza Chef»Paddington Jonathan & Judy are worried they've used up all of Lucky the dog's luck - how will they tell Sofia? // Baaz's niece Simi is visiting & he wants to create the perfect pizza to surprise her with but it's not easy with hungry animals around!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News) S2 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News»The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La pendule à coucou) S2 (30/52)
programme.desc: «La pendule à coucou»The old cuckoo clock in Peppa and George's bedroom hasn't worked for sometime. So, Daddy Pig winds it up. The clock strikes the hour and a wooden cuckoo pops out, flapping its wings and singing "Cuckoo!!" Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George was looking the wrong way and has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une promenade à vélo) S2 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Une promenade à vélo»Peppa and her family are going for a day's cycle ride. Peppa rides her little bicycle. Mummy and Daddy Pig ride their tandem, with George on the back. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she's not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppa's friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le patin à glace) S2 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le patin à glace»When Peppa's friends come to play in her tree house, it's super fun, but when the boys come, things go wrong. Peppa unceremoniously puts them out. Grandpa knows what to do and builds a castle hut for the boys, but whether it makes it more fun?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Chez le dentiste) S2 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Chez le dentiste»Peppa has been to the dentist before, but for George it is the first time. And that's scary.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Mission ninja à la montagne) S6 (n°615)
programme.desc: «Mission ninja à la montagne»Ninjas Zooli and Oona are excited for their first mission: escorting snow monkey Moshi up Mt. Danger to join his troop! But it won't be easy: a storm looms, and mischievous Moshi is causing trouble! Will they complete their mission in time?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Cache-cache avec Blue) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Cache-cache avec Blue»Josh, Blue, and all our friends are playing Hide and Seek, and Blue knows the BEST hiding spot! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the best place to hide, we search for our hiding friends and play Snail and Seek with Magenta and Blue.

programme.desc: «La chasse au trésor de Blue»Cap'n McStripes (that's ''pirate'' for Josh) and Blue are playing pirates, but where is the treasure?! We play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle»When Humdinger disguises himself as a "Merdinger" to steal the purple pearl, the PAW Patrol must return it to Puplantis. // After Moby swipes the Whale Patroller and all the Pups' vehicles, the pups climb aboard sea creatures to chase it down.

programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race»The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger.

programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Un train fou dans le désert / Le parcours d'escalarbre) S8 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Un train fou dans le désert / Le parcours d'escalarbre»When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. // Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le petit crabe perdu) S2 (6/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le petit crabe perdu»The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'embouteillage) S2 (13/52)
programme.desc: «L'embouteillage»Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam. They still haven't arrived by the time lunch is ready, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them - in his wheelbarrow. There's enough delicious food for everyone in the traffic jam.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les flaques d'eau de mer) S2 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Les flaques d'eau de mer»Peppa and George are at the seaside with Granny and Grandpa Pig. Peppa and George like sandy beaches, but this is a different kind of beach, with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. Peppa, George, Granny and Grandpa Pig have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jour de sortie de Teddy) S2 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Le jour de sortie de Teddy»Peppa et George emmènent leurs jouets préférés en pique-nique...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Funny Photo) S1 (n°77)
programme.desc: «The Funny Photo»While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Gift Box) S1 (n°78)
programme.desc: «The Gift Box»The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie»By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (L'équipe pleine d'idées) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «L'équipe pleine d'idées»Clues house! While playing "superheroes" we hear a super strange noise. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where it's coming from. On the way, we learn about the powers our Superfriends have too!

programme.title: Dora l'exploratrice (Dora et les pirates) S3 (25/25)
programme.desc: «Dora et les pirates»Dora and friends are about to put on a pirate play when the Pirate Piggies steal their treasure chest and costumes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie»By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Down the Sewers) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Down the Sewers»When Sir Steel's dog Muffin's ball goes missing down the sewers, Bobbi has to face his fear of the dark.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil»The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le concours de talents) S2 (23/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le concours de talents»It's the Windsor Gardens Pet show, Paddington is the judge but they're all so talented how can he choose?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse»When an out-of-this-world visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby Shark and his friends must put their stellar communication skills to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Lemonade) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Lemonade»Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Shooting Star) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Shooting Star»Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fixing Things) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Fixing Things»Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Detectives) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «The Detectives»Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La journée du oui) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «La journée du oui»Baby convinces Daddy to say "yup" to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle) S9 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle»When Humdinger disguises himself as a "Merdinger" to steal the purple pearl, the PAW Patrol must return it to Puplantis. // After Moby swipes the Whale Patroller and all the Pups' vehicles, the pups climb aboard sea creatures to chase it down.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race) S9 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race»The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle) S9 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la chasse aux oeufs) S2 (18/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la chasse aux oeufs»Paddington and the Egg Hunt: Can Sofia make Windsor Gardens' biggest ever omelette? Only if Paddington can replace some cracked eggs in time. (S2, ep 18a).

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Zeg et l'oeuf) S1 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Zeg et l'oeuf»While playing Begg, Zegg's favorite game, the Monster Wheels find the egg of a Truckadactylus. The Monster Wheels do everything they can to return the egg to the nest as soon as possible.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le Grand Défi des 100 Oeufs) S4 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Le Grand Défi des 100 Oeufs»A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away! To bring him home, Blaze, AJ and the King's adorable pet dragon Zeek must transform into knights in shining armor!
